sentences.english: Distortion of automobile synchronizer gear sleeves will take place during the course of carburization and quenching.
sentences.chinese: 汽車同步器齒套在滲碳淬火後，發生變形。

sentences.english: Rapid carburizing process by increasing furnace pressure is introduced and its mechanism is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了快速壓力滲碳工藝，並對其機理進行了分析。

sentences.english: A newly developed BBH pre - vacuum - pumping carburizing furnace has been introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了新研製的預抽真空式可控氣氛氣體滲碳爐。

sentences.english: When designing a continuous type carburizing furnace, it is necessary to take account of degreasing.
sentences.chinese: 連續式滲碳爐設計時，應考慮脫脂問題。

sentences.english: Spheroidizing is the process of producing a structure in which the cementite is in a spheroidal distribution.
sentences.chinese: 球化是使滲碳體產生成類似球狀分佈結構的工藝。

sentences.english: Amount of time product spends in a furnace at specified temperature for the purpose of carburizing or hardening product.
sentences.chinese: 產品在爐中某特定溫度下滲碳或硬化所需要的時間。

sentences.english: The tempering operation may be described as one of precipitation and agglomeration or coalescence of cementite.
sentences.chinese: 回火作業可以描述爲滲碳體析出和凝聚或聚結的過程。

sentences.english: The processing of carburization affects the quality of products in heat treatment directly.
sentences.chinese: 滲碳工藝過程的執行，直接關係到熱處理產品的質量。

sentences.english: A new research & development of continuous gas carburizing furnace is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了新研製的網帶連續式氣體滲碳爐。

sentences.english: This model is used to achieve the calculation and actual time control of deep carburization with high concentration.
sentences.chinese: 應用該模型實現了高濃度深層滲碳的計算機實時控制。

sentences.english: The low-temperature RE carburizing technology is explored by a series of tests.
sentences.chinese: 通過一系列試驗，摸索出利用稀土低溫滲碳技術。

sentences.english: So the diamond growth up depends on the consumption of original cementite.
sentences.chinese: 金剛石的生長通過對初生滲碳體的消耗得以進行。

sentences.english: The main production of solid carburizing agent.
The distribution of cementite particle size displayed bimodal.
sentences.chinese: 顆粒狀滲碳體的尺寸呈雙峯分佈。

sentences.english: High carburized rate was attained by using Al 2O 3 fluidized bed furnace.
sentences.chinese: 剛玉流動粒子爐滲碳能夠獲得較高的滲碳速度。

sentences.english: High carburized rate was attained by using Al 2O 3 fluidized bed furnace.
sentences.chinese: 剛玉流動粒子爐滲碳能夠獲得較高的滲碳速度。
